sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SANTERRE, a ſmall territory of France, in Picardy; bounded on the north by Cambreſis, on the eaſt by Vermandois, on the weft by Amienois, and on the ſouth by the river Somme. It is very fertile, and the capital town is Peronne.
